channel.title: Netlify on Rishab Dhar
channel.description: Recent content in Netlify on Rishab Dhar

item.title: Deploying a Blog Powered by Hugo to Netlify
item.description: This guide explains how to set up a blog using Hugo and PaperMod, configure Netlify to deploy it, and link a custom domain to your Netlify site. You can also watch the step-by-step video by theplaybook on YouTube. Install Hugo On MacOS : brew install hugo On Windows : choco install hugo On Linux : sudo apt install hugo Create a New Site hugo new site portfolio -f yml Run hugo new site <site_name> to create a new Hugo site in the <site_name> directory.
